Noun phrase:
$adjective $noun | $adjective =~ /^[bcdfghlmnprst]*[aeiouáéíóú]+[bcdfghlmnprst]+$/ # monosyllabic adjectives can move to front, or maybe become compound word
$noun séimhiú($adjective) | feminine($noun) && $noun =~ /^[bcdfgmpst]/
$noun $adjective
Definite:
an t$noun | feminine($noun) && $noun =~/^s[lnraeiouáéíóú]/
an séimhiú($noun) | feminine($noun) && $noun =~ /^[bcdfghlmnprst]/
an t-$noun | masculine($noun) && $noun =~ /^[aeiouáéíóú]/
an $noun
